item.title: Furry paws driving China's growing pet economy
item.author: ANN - Asia News Network
item.description: SHANGHAI(China Daily/ANN) - Wang Lihong, who prefers to be called "Congcong's mom" rather than by her own name, and her five-year-old Yorkshire terrier have found themselves increasingly welcome in a number of places across Shanghai. "Our weekends are fully booked with activities. Just recently, we ...
